itemLabel: Maggie Jones, Baroness Jones of Whitchurch

wikipedia_page.main: Margaret Beryl Jones, Baroness Jones of Whitchurch (born 22 May 1955) is a British Labour Peer and previously a trade union official and Labour politician. She was Chair of the Labour Party from 2000 to 2001.
